LanguageData.DesignatorFishingZoneDesc: Create an area where your hunters will fish. Must be placed over water containing fish. Larger bodies of water are generally better for fishing.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaSnowOrSandClearExpandDesc: Create an area which colonists will try to keep clear of snow and sand.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaSnowOrSandClearClear: Clear snow and sand removal area
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaSnowOrSandClearClearDesc: Removes a snow and sand removal area. Colonists will no longer try to keep this area clear of snow and sand.
LanguageData.DesignatorRemoveFoundationDesc: Remove bridges or gravship substructure to reveal the terrain underneath.
